https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/splPNB0vAoNlb8l5WYxz2E3FK2G.jpg Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap. Buried
